column5: Thought I would share my favorite photo from the day...  Wee Cooper hanging with Dad behind the waterfall of the Jaguar exhibit.  I love this kid!!!    Just looking cool, handling the day.
That's a great pic Steve.  Look at those big blue eyes.  Joey
He gets excited when new things happen.  he clinches his teeth and lips, can't buy a smile from the kid in that situation.
Cooper has some beautiful blue eyes. Are those another set of eye's behind the ice????
that is not ice, but a fast thin waterfall!!!  those eyes you see may be the polar bears that passed away at Metro Zoo and are haunting the grounds.  Believe it or not, they died of the west nile!
PF, our family's tradition is usually to head to the Zoo on New Year's Day !  Nice pic of your young guy  .
Sounds like fun, I like going to aquariums too, the one in Vancouver is good and the ones in San Diego or Chicago are amazing.  Mike
